title: r/Maliciouscompliance Mr. Rogers' Revenge
description:
r/Maliciouscompliance Ever wonder how Mr. Rogers would get revenge? Probably like the guy in this story! A couple of sucky neighbors act like douchebags by throwing all of their garbage into their kind neighbor's yards. So, the sweet neighbor turns all of their trash into compost and then politely asks them for more! If you like this video and want to see more, hit the subscribe button!

Watch on YouTube: https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=p75368n2Lok
dc:creator: rSlash Reads Reddit
